bill_title: provide that required exterior hunting garments may be fluorescent pink.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to provide that required exterior hunting garments may be fluorescent pink. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 41-8-41 be AMENDED: 41-8-41. Any A person hunting using a firearm to hunt any big game animal, except other than a turkey or a mountain lion, with a firearm shall wear, in a visible manner one or more above the waist, a fluorescent orange exterior garments. The or fluorescent pink exterior garment shall be. For purposes of this section, the term "exterior garment" means a hat, cap, shirt, jacket, vest, coverall, or poncho worn above the waist. A violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor.
